original: \n\nIf executed at night this mission has a much lower chance of being detected, but it suffers a penalty to acquiring targets.
translation: \n\n若该任务在夜晚执行，则被侦查到的几率会更小，但同样会遭受瞄准惩罚。

original: Attempt to achieve air superiority by engaging enemy fighters, and secondarily enemy bombers and other planes.
translation: 优先攻击敌方战斗机以获得制空权，对轰炸机和其他机种的攻击则居于其次。
辅助地面部队执行战斗任务

original: Attempt to prevent enemy planes from doing missions in the region, such as bombing or close air support.
translation: 尝试阻止敌机在区域内执行轰炸或近距空中支援任务。

original: Bomb enemy buildings, infrastructure and industry.
translation: 轰炸敌方建筑、基础设施和工厂。

original: Increases supply in the area. The amount of supplies delivered is affected by mission efficiency, interception and enemy AA.
translation: 增加此地区补给。投放的补给数量受任务效率、敌军拦截和敌军防空的影响。

original: Perform kamikaze attacks on enemy ships in area. This will greatly increase damage, but also increase your own losses.
translation: 在区域内对敌舰进行神风突击。这将会大幅度增加战果，但也会伤敌八百，自损一千。
§R没有足够§!的核弹来发动核打击！

original: §RCan't perform missions when the Carrier is docked in a port.§!
translation: §R当航母停泊在港口时，不能执行任务§!

original: §T$COUNTRY|UH$ has around $AMOUNT|H$ airplanes in this airbase.§!
translation: §T$COUNTRY|UH$在这个空军基地有大约$AMOUNT|H$架飞机。§!

original: Set reinforcement limit on this aircraft stack.
translation: 为该机群设置增援上限。

original: §GRight-click to set the limit to the current number of airplanes§!
Missions are only executed during the §Hday§!.

translation: 返回基地（$PERC|%H$，预计到达时间：$ETA|%H$）

original: Split the selected Air Wings in two
translation: 把选中的空军联队分为两支

original: §RCannot create air wing! Not enough service manpower for it.§!
§RTo merge, select two or more Air Wings of the same type from the same airbase, that are not in transfer and have at most $MAX|H$ planes in them.§!
translation: §R合并。选择两个以上的同一基地，同一机种的空军联队，这些空军联队未处于转场状态中，飞机数量也不能超过$MAX|H$。§!

original: §RSelect one or two Air Wings of the same type from the same airbase and are not in transfer.§!
translation: §R选择一或二个同一基地，同一机种的，并且未处于转场状态的空军联队。§!

original: §RSelect one Air Wing that is not in transfer and has at least §H2§! planes.§!
translation: §R选择一个未处于转场状态，并拥有至少§H2§!架飞机的空军联队。§!
取消空军联队指派的集团军？

original: You are about to detach this Air Wing from the Army. This will remove its current orders. Are you sure?
translation: 你将取消这个空军联队所指派的集团军。这将取消当前任务指令。是否确定？

original: §RSome airplanes will be returned to reserves.§!
§RYou can't set the limit lower than the number of airplanes.§!
translation: §R你不能把上限设得比飞机数量还低。§!

original: Set amount of aircraft to split.
\nNot all wings have coverage in this region.
translation: \n并非所有的空军部队都覆盖了该区域。

original: \nNo wings have coverage in this region.
This rocket site is fully operational and has $CURR|H$ of a maximum of $MAX|H$ rockets.
translation: 此火箭基地全面运转，可存放$CURR|H$最多$MAX|H$火箭。

original: \n§gExceeding the capacity will limit rocket efficiency and stop production of new rockets at this site.§!
translation: \n§g火箭基地的过量库存将会限制作战效率，并且该基地的新火箭也会停止生产。§!

original: This rocket site is operating at $PERC|%0R$ efficiency due to having too many rockets in storage.
translation: 由于库存太多，该火箭基地以$PERC|%0R$的效率运转中。

original: \n§RNo further rockets will be produced while capacity is at maximum.§!
translation: \n§R火箭基地存放量已达最大值，无法生产火箭。§!

original: The Air base is fully operational.\n§gExceeding the operational limit may affect the aircraft throughput and reduce the missions efficiency.§!
translation: 空军基地已全面运转。\n§g增加其运转上限也许会影响承载量，并降低任务执行效率。§!

original: Next air base building level will §Yincrease operational limit§! to: $VAL|G$
translation: 下一个空军基地建筑等级将会§Y增加运转范围§!到：$VAL|G$

original: §RThe Air base is overcrowded.§!\nMissions are on $PERC|%R$ efficiency.\nConsider relocating your aircraft to another air base, or expand the air base to a higher level.
translation: §R空军基地飞机数量超过上限§!\n任务以$PERC|%R$的效率执行着。\n考虑一下是转场你的飞机到另一空军基地，还是提升空军基地等级。
空军基地飞机数量超过上限：$PERC|%0=+$

original: We have $OURS|H$ Airplanes stationed here.\nThere are $TOTAL|H$ Airplanes stationed here in total.
translation: 我们有$OURS|H$架飞机停放在此。\n总共有$TOTAL|H$架飞机停放在此。

original:
Aircraft detection Total: $TOT|%G$
  From controlled territory: $BASE|%G$
  Radars in range: $RAD|%G$
  Active airplanes in region: $AIR|%G$

 Detection total reduced by a factor $DETECT_RED|R$
  Night: $NIGHT|%R$
  Bad weather: $WEA|%R$
translation:
对空探测：$TOT|%G$
 控制的地上地区：$BASE|%G$
 范围内雷达：$RAD|%G$
 区域内投入的飞机：$AIR|%G$

探测降低系数：$DETECT_RED|R$
 夜晚：$NIGHT|%R$
 天气恶劣：$WEA|%R$

original: Lacking range to completely cover area: $PERC|%1=+$
translation: 因航程无法完全覆盖作战区域：$PERC|%1=+$

original: §TAirbase priority sets order of arrival for replacement aircraft to airbases.§!
translation: §T空军基地增援优先：补充至该基地的飞机将优先输送。§!
部队部署中（$PERC|%H$，预计抵达时间：$ETA|%H$）

original: Deployment canceled, returning to Reserves ($PERC|%H$, expected arrival: $ETA|%H$)
translation: 部队部署取消，飞机送回库存（$PERC|%H$，预计抵达时间：$ETA|%H$）

original: Right click to assign selected Air Wings
translation: 右键点击分配选中的空军联队

original: §GDrag air units here to assign them to this air zone.\nRight-click on an air unit to assign them to this air zone.§!
translation: §G拖放空军单位至此以将其分配到这一空域。\n右击一个空军单位以将其分配到这一空域。§!

original: Do you want to assign all Air Wings within range to $REGION|H$?\n$COUNT|H$ Air Wings will be assigned.
translation: 确认将范围内未分配的空军联队全部分配至$REGION|H$？\n$COUNT|H$个联队将会被分配。

original: There are no unassigned Air Wings within range.
translation: 范围内没有未分配的空军联队。

original: There are no Air Wings within range.
§GClick to assign all unassigned Air Wings within range to this region.§!
translation: §G点击分配范围内所有未分配的空军联队到此区域。§!

original: §RThere are no unassigned Air Wings within range.§!
translation: §R范围内没有未分配的空军联队。§!

original: §GShift+Click to assign all Air Wings within range to this region.§!
translation: §G按住Shift点击分配范围内所有空军联队到此区域。§!

original: §RAll Air Wings within range are already assigned to this region.§!
translation: §R范围内所有空军联队已经分配到此区域。§!

original: §GRight-click to reassign Air Wings to this area§!
translation: §G右键点击重分配空军联队到这一区域§!

original: §GClick to move all active Air Wings to the closest possible bases for optimal performance.§!
translation: §G点击让所有可用的空军联队移动到最近的基地以提高效率。§!

original: Do you want to reassign Air Wings from $FROM|H$ to $TO|H$?\n$COUNT|H$ Air Wings will be assigned.
translation: 确定将$FROM|H$的全部空军联队分配给$TO|H$？\n$COUNT|H$个联队将会被分配。

original: No Air Wings are within range of $REGION|H$.
§TThere are no Air Wings assigned to this region.§!
translation: §T没有空军联队分配到这个区域。§!

original: §GClick and then right click on a target region to reassign Air Wings.§!
translation: §G点击后右击目标地区来重分配空军联队。§!

original: Returning $COUNT|Y$ aircraft of $NAME|H$ from transfer to $TARGET|H$ ($PROGRESS|%H$).
Cancel this deployment transfer, the aircraft will start transferring back and then be available for a new transfer.
translation: 取消这次转场部署，战机会开始返回，此后可进行下一次转场。

original: §RYou can't select this Air Wing before it has been deployed.§!
$NUM|G$ of $MOD|Y$ from $FROM|Y$\n   $DEAD|R$ shot down by the enemy.
§GDrop selected planes here to start transfer planes to $AIRBASE|H$.§!
translation: §G拖放选中的战机至此来将战机转场至$AIRBASE|H$。§!

original: §RCan transfer only carrier type planes to carrier.§!
translation: §R只能将舰载机转场至航空母舰。§!

original: §RBase is not available for transferring of planes§!
§ROut of range of this Air Zone!§!
§RYou don't have access to this Air Base§!
translation: §R你没有这个空军基地的通行权§!
分配 §Y$COVERED$/$TOTAL$§! 个范围内的联队到$REGION|Y$

original: Are you sure you want to remove the $NAME|H$ Air Wing and return all its equipment to Reserves?
translation: 确认要解散$NAME|H$联队并将所有装备转入库存？

original: Are you sure you want to remove $COUNT|H$ Air Wings and return all its equipment to Reserves?
translation: 确认要解散$COUNT|H$只联队并将所有装备转入库存？

original: Are you sure you want to cancel the deployment and return all its equipment to Reserves?
translation: 确认要取消部署并将所有装备返还库存？

original: This airbase §RNon operational§! because we do not control the airport.
translation: 这个空军基地§R不可用§!，因为我们没有控制机场。

original: This airbase §RNon operational§! because we cannot access airport in demilitarized zone.
translation: 这个空军基地§R不可用§!，我们不能使用非军事区的机场。

original: §HFriendly Radar Efficiency§!\nThe higher the §YRadar Efficiency§! in this area the easier interceptors will find enemies and patrols find other planes. Get higher efficiency by building higher level radar in range.
translation: §H我方雷达效率§!\n本区域的§Y雷达效率§!越高则拦截机越容易发现敌人，空中巡逻更易接敌。在范围内建造更高等级的雷达站来提高雷达效率。

original: §HEnemy Radar Efficiency§!\nThe higher the §YRadar Efficiency§! in this area the easier interceptors will find enemies and patrols find other planes. Get higher efficiency by building higher level radar in range.
translation: §H敌方雷达效率§!\n本区域的§Y雷达效率§!越高则拦截机越容易发现敌人，空中巡逻更易接敌。在范围内建造更高等级的雷达站来提高雷达效率。

original: Keep flying missions no matter the casualties.
Only fly missions if wings are at $VAL|%0Y$ strength.
translation: 只在联队高于$VAL|%0Y$兵力时执行任务。
大多数联队：§H低烈度行动§!

original: Only fly missions if wings are at $VAL|%0Y$ strength.
translation: 只在联队高于$VAL|%0Y$兵力时执行任务。
§R指挥点数不足以执行此任务§!

original: §RWe won't be able to fit all air wings in closer bases, do you still want to rebase them?§!
translation: §R我们无法将全部空军联队安排到最近的基地，是否仍然进行重分配基地？§!

original: §RAll active planes already in the closest possible bases.§!
translation: §R所有可用战机已经在最近的基地。§!

original: \n§RSome bases will be left overcrowded if we do this§!
translation: \n§R如果我们这么做，会有机场超过承载能力§!

original: Move §H1§! equipment\n§GCtrl+click to move §H10§!\n§GShift+click to move §H100§!
translation: 转移§H1§!件装备\n§GCtrl+点击转移§H10§!件\n§GShift+点击转移§H100§!件

original: §GRight-click to move selected Air Wings to this base§!
translation: §G右键点击将选中的空军联队转场到这个基地§!

original: §RNot all selected Air Wings can be transferred here:§!
translation: §R并非全部选中的空军联队都可以转场到这个基地：§!

original: §RNone of the selected Air Wings can be transferred here:§!
translation: §R选中的空军联队全部无法转场到这个基地：§!

original: §RNone of the selected Rockets can be transferred here:§!
translation: §R选中的火箭无法被转移到这里：§!

original: §R$COUNT|H$ Air Wings can't be stationed on a carrier.§!
translation: §R$COUNT|H$个空军联队无法安置在航空母舰上。§!

original: §R$COUNT|H$ Air Wings can't be transferred between rocket sites.§!
translation: §R$COUNT|H$个空军联队无法转场到火箭基地。§!

original: §R$COUNT|H$ Rockets can't be transferred between rocket sites.§!
translation: §R$COUNT|H$枚火箭无法在火箭基地间进行转移。§!

original: §R$COUNT|H$ Air Wings are already stationed in the air base.§!
translation: §R$COUNT|H$个空军联队已经在目标基地。§!

original: §R$COUNT|H$ Rockets are already stationed in the air base.§!
§R$COUNT|H$ Air Wings don't have access to the air base.§!
translation: §R$COUNT|H$个空军联队无法进入目标基地。§!

original: §RNot all selected Air Wings can be assigned here:§!
translation: §R不是所有选中的空军联队都能分配到这里：§!

original: §RNone of the selected Air Wings can be assigned here:§!
translation: §R全部选中的空军联队都无法分配到这里：§!

original: §R$COUNT|H$ Air Wings are stationed on a carrier on a mission.§!
translation: §R$COUNT|H$个航空母舰上的联队正在任务中。§!

original: §GThe Wings will be transferred to $NAME|H$ because it has the highest Capacity left.§!
translation: §G联队将转场至$NAME|H$因为其空余承载量最多。§!

original: §GRight-click to assign selected Air Wings to this area§!
translation: §G右键点击将选中空军联队分配到这个区域§!

original: §GClick to open the air base window§!
§GClick to go to close the air base window§!
§TSelect half of the current air wings§!
§RNeed to have at least §H2§! Air Wings selected§!
§GClick to add Air Wings stationed here to selection.§!
translation: §G点击选中搭载的舰载机联队。§!

original: §GClick to remove Air Wings stationed here from selection.§!
translation: §G点击撤销选中的舰载机联队。§!

original: §RMission will not be executed§!\nEnemy §Yair superiority§! is at $CURRENT|H2%$.\nMission requires at most $REQUIRED|H2%$.
translation: §R无法执行任务§!\n敌方§Y制空权§!为$CURRENT|H2%$。\n任务需要其在$REQUIRED|H2%$以下。

original: Reserves contain airplanes that are not being used. Select an Airbase and then click on Create New Air Wing to deploy them.
translation: 库存包括了那些未投入使用的战机.选中一个空军基地并点击创建新空军联队来部署这些战机。

original: §RYou don't have any planes that can be stationed here in reserves.§!
translation: §R库存中没有任何可以部署在这里的战机。§!

original: Ace is assigned to a wing smaller than $DEFINE|0Y$ so all effects are increased by $MOD|0%Y$ to compensate.
translation: 王牌飞行员被分配到了一个小于 $DEFINE|0Y$ 架飞机的联队，因此所有加成提高了 $MOD|0%Y$ 作为补偿。

original: Ace is assigned to a wing larger than $DEFINE|0Y$ so all effects are increased by $MOD|0%Y$ to compensate.
translation: 王牌飞行员被分配到了一个大于 $DEFINE|0Y$ 架飞机的联队，因此所有加成提高了 $MOD|0%Y$ 作为补偿。

original: Air Wings will follow this Carrier when it leaves the region they operate in.
translation: 当航空母舰离开行动中的区域时，空军联队会跟随航空母舰一起离开。

original: Air Wings will NOT follow this Carrier when it leaves the region they operate in.
translation: 当航空母舰离开行动中的区域时，空军联队不会跟随航空母舰离开。

original: This Air Wing will follow the Carrier it's stationed on when it leaves the current region.
translation: 当航空母舰离开区域时，空军联队会跟随航空母舰一起离开。

original: Sortie efficiency is reduced by $EFFICIENCY|0%R$ because the carrier is operating in $REGIONS|Y$ regions.
translation: 因为航母在$REGIONS|Y$区域发起行动，出动效率减少了$EFFICIENCY|0%R$。

original: Can be stationed on a carrier
§RThere are no Air Wings assigned to this region.§!
translation: §R此区域没有分配任何空军联队。§!

original: Most wings execute missions during the §Hday§!.
translation: 大多数联队在§H白天§!执行任务。
大多数联队在§H夜晚§!执行任务。

original: Most wings execute missions both §Hday§! and §Hnight§!.
translation: 大多数联队§H白天§!和§H夜晚§!都执行任务。

original: Need $AMOUNT|H$ planes to reach full strength
translation: 需要补充$AMOUNT|H$架才能达到最大兵力

original: §GClick§! to attach selected air wings to the army
translation: §G点击§!将空军联队指派给集团军

original: Hold §GCtrl§! to detach assigned air wings
translation: 按住§GCtrl§!取消指派的空军联队

original: §RSelect air wings to attach to the army§!
translation: §R选择要指派给集团军的空军联队§!

original: §GClick§! to select air wings attached to the army
translation: §G点击§!已指派给集团军的空军联队

original: §RNeed to have at least §H1§! Air Wing selected§!
§HEnemy Planes Disrupted§!\nEnough damage was inflicted to force the plane to return home before carrying out its mission.
translation: §H敌方被干扰的飞机§!\n足够的伤害使得这些飞机在执行任务之前就不得不返回基地。

original: §HFriendly Planes Disrupted§!\nEnough damage was inflicted to force the plane to return home before carrying out its mission.
translation: §H友方被干扰的飞机§!\n足够的伤害使得这些飞机在执行任务之前就不得不返回基地。
§H敌方被防空火炮击落的飞机§!
§H友方被防空火炮击落的飞机§!

original: §HOur Missions§!\nShow results from missions flown by our Air Wings.
translation: §H我方任务§!\n显示我方飞机执行任务的结果。

original: §HEnemy Missions§!\nShow results from missions flown by enemy Air Wings.
translation: §H敌方任务§!\n显示敌方飞机执行任务的结果。

original: §HLast Sortie§!\nShow results from the last Sortie.
translation: §H上次出击§!\n显示上次出击的结果。

original: §HLast Day§!\nShow results from the last 24 hours.
translation: §H过去一天§!\n显示过去24小时的结果。

original: §HWing specific average§!: $VAL|H%$\n(Coverage, Airbase Capacity and Supply)
translation: §H特定联队平均值§!：$VAL|H%$\n（覆盖率、空军基地容量以及补给状况）

original: Our average §HAir Attack§! is §Ghigher§! than their §HAir Defense§!
translation: 我方平均§H对空攻击§!§G高于§!敌方§H空中防御§!

original: Our average §HAir Attack§! is §Rlower§! than their §HAir Defense§!
translation: 我方平均§H对空攻击§!§R低于§!敌方§H空中防御§!

original: Our average §HAir Attack§! is the §Hsame§! as their §HAir Defense§!
translation: 我方平均§H对空攻击§!§H等于§!敌方§H空中防御§!

original: Our average §HAir Defense§! is §Ghigher§! than their §HAir Attack§!
translation: 我方平均§H空中防御§!§G高于§!敌方§H对空攻击§!

original: Our average §HAir Defense§! is §Rlower§! than their §HAir Attack§!
translation: 我方平均§H空中防御§!§R低于§!敌方§H对空攻击§!

original: Our average §HAir Defense§! is the §Hsame§! as their §HAir Attack§!
translation: 我方平均§H空中防御§!§H等于§!敌方§H对空攻击§!
我方平均§H机动§!§G高于§!敌方
我方平均§H机动§!§R低于§!敌方

original: Our average §HAgility§! is the §Hsame§! as theirs
translation: 我方平均§H机动§!和敌方§H相等§!
我方平均§H速度§!§G高于§!敌方
我方平均§H速度§!§R低于§!敌方

original: Our average §HSpeed§! is the §Hsame§! as theirs
translation: 我方平均§H速度§!和敌方§H相等§!

original: §GClick§! to toggle view of this mission.\n§GShift+click§! to only view this.
translation: §G点击§!切换是否显示这个任务。\n§GShift+点击§!只显示这个任务。

original: The higher the §YAir Detection§! is in an area the easier it is to locate and engage enemy planes. This affects the amount of active planes that enter combat.
translation: 区域的§Y对空探测§!越高，就越容易发现和迎击敌方的飞机。这个参数影响参加战斗的飞机总数。

original: Amount of planes engaged in combat during last period.\nThe amount of active planes in the region that engage in combat is affected by §HAir Detection§!.
translation: 时间段内迎击的飞机总数。\n区域内参加战斗的飞机总数受到§H对空探测§!影响。

original: Amount of planes carrying out §HGround Missions§! during last period.
